revisionDesc.change: Duke Proofreading Corrections; redate based on duk.00599 and Pendleton photo for Hannah
Proofreading corrections, Walt's letters, date note, and Pendleton note.
revised GWW and LOW wedding date note to read "spring 1871"
Clean encoding (editor, date, remove "_large") and add standard annotations on unannotated files (Jeff W, Martha [Mattie], George W, Lou Haslam)
Encode regularization of contractions, days of week, and frequently misspelled words

body.p:
i received your letter on mondayMonday glad to hear you get along so well every one seems to complain so much of the weather its it's hot to be shure sure but its it's no use fretting about it well Walt i have been to day and had my picture taken i have been saving money for it for this 2 months and to day i have been to pendletonsPendleton's on the corner of fulton Fulton and johnson st Johnson St. and had six large ones taken i went alone
i told the man i wanted very extraordinary ones fer for the were to go to a distance and he said he would take the best that could be taken i set three times the last one did look very good the others was good only the eyes wasent wasn't so good they will cost nearly 20 dollar yours and georgesGeorge's i will have framed and one for myself i shall send han one in the package so you see waltWalt i bequeath something to my children so they will not forget me) i hear nothin from Jeff and matt maybee maybe they are away) good bie walterWalter dear

postscript.p: i will give the book to helen
